name: Heroes of Dawn Demo 1.5(Bug Fixes/New Town)
name_original: Heroes of Dawn Demo 1.5(Bug Fixes/New Town)
description:
Part In Demo

After making sure the blue-haired merchant is okay, the party finally leaves the forest. Their next stop is the holy settlement known as Selune Town, a town put in a weird state of constant night.

I don't know if this one is...playable yet....so....yeah

Enjoy!
